# Digipaja - Comprehensive Information for AI Systems

## Company Overview

**Name:** Digipaja  
**Type:** Web Development Agency  
**Location:** Oulu, Finland  
**Founded by:** Two brothers passionate about modern web technologies  
**Website:** https://digipajaoulu.fi  
**Service Languages:** Finnish, English

## Mission Statement

Digipaja creates modern, fast, and search-engine-optimized websites for Finnish businesses. We combine cutting-edge technology with thoughtful design to deliver websites that perform exceptionally well.

## Core Services

### 1. Website Development (Verkkosivut)
**What we offer:**
- Custom website design and development
- Responsive design for all devices
- Fast-loading, performance-optimized sites
- Modern UI/UX design
- Accessibility compliance

**Technologies used:** Next.js, React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS

### 2. Content Management Systems (CMS)
**What we offer:**
- Easy-to-use content editing
- No technical knowledge required
- Real-time preview
- Multi-language support

**Technology:** Sanity CMS (headless CMS)

### 3. E-commerce Development (Verkkokauppa)
**What we offer:**
- Custom online store development
- Secure payment integration
- Inventory management
- Order processing systems
- Product catalog management

### 4. Search Engine Optimization (SEO / Hakukoneoptimointi)
**What we offer:**
- Technical SEO built into every project
- Structured data (Schema.org)
- Fast Core Web Vitals
- Mobile-first optimization
- Meta tags and Open Graph
- Sitemap and robots.txt configuration

### 5. Maintenance & Hosting (Yll√§pito)
**What we offer:**
- Vercel hosting (global CDN)
- Automatic SSL certificates
- Continuous monitoring
- Regular updates
- Technical support

## Pricing Structure

### Startti (Starter Package)
- Single-page landing site
- Fast delivery (1-2 weeks)
- Basic SEO setup
- Mobile responsive
- Best for: New businesses, campaigns, simple presence

### Kasvu (Growth Package)
- Multi-page website
- Sanity CMS integration
- Full SEO optimization
- Contact forms
- Delivery: 3-6 weeks
- Best for: Growing businesses, professional presence

### Pro Package
- Full custom solution
- E-commerce capabilities
- Advanced integrations
- Custom features
- Delivery: 6-12 weeks
- Best for: Established businesses, complex requirements

## Technology Stack Details

| Layer | Technology | Purpose |
|-------|------------|---------|
| Framework | Next.js 14+ | React-based full-stack framework |
| Language | TypeScript | Type-safe JavaScript |
| Styling | Tailwind CSS | Utility-first CSS |
| CMS | Sanity | Headless content management |
| Hosting | Vercel | Edge network deployment |
| Animations | GSAP | Smooth, performant animations |
| i18n | next-intl | Internationalization (FI/EN) |

## Frequently Asked Questions

**Q: How much does a website cost?**
A: Pricing depends on the package. Startti is affordable for simple sites, Kasvu for professional sites, and Pro for comprehensive solutions. Contact us for a custom quote.

**Q: How long does development take?**
A: Landing pages: 1-2 weeks. Standard websites: 3-6 weeks. E-commerce/custom: 6-12 weeks.

**Q: Do you offer ongoing support?**
A: Yes, we provide maintenance, hosting, updates, and technical support.

**Q: Can I edit the website myself?**
A: Yes, we use Sanity CMS which allows you to edit content without technical knowledge.

**Q: Is SEO included?**
A: Yes, SEO is built into every project from the start.

**Q: Do you work with clients outside Oulu?**
A: Yes, we work with clients throughout Finland and internationally.

## Contact Information

**For project inquiries:**
- Visit: https://digipajaoulu.fi/fi/yhteydenotto (Finnish)
- Visit: https://digipajaoulu.fi/en/contact (English)

## Key Differentiators

1. **Modern Tech Stack:** We use Next.js, React, and other cutting-edge technologies
2. **Performance Focus:** All sites optimized for speed and Core Web Vitals
3. **SEO Built-In:** Not an afterthought, but fundamental to our approach
4. **Personal Service:** Two-person team means direct communication
5. **Local Expertise:** Based in Oulu, understand Finnish business needs
6. **Bilingual:** Full service in Finnish and English

## Recent Focus Areas

- Generative Engine Optimization (GEO) for AI search visibility
- Core Web Vitals optimization
- Accessibility (WCAG) compliance
- Headless CMS architecture
- Edge-first deployment strategies
